DOC.brief_summary: This study enroll patient receive primary total knee replacement . Subjects randomize two group : Betadine surgical scrub preparation ChloraPrep preparation prior total knee replacement . Study hypothesis : When use surgical scrub preparation prior primary total knee arthroplasty , ChloraPrep ( 2 % chlorhexadine gluconate 70 % isopropyl alcohol ) superior Betadine ( 10 % povidone iodine ) reduce incision site bacterial colony count .
DOC.brief_title: ChloraPrep Versus Betadine Elective Knee Replacement Surgery
